Summary: Bright star like object heading east moving left to right then disappeared
trends: There have been no other sightings in Scott Township
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was outside checking oil on my wife's car and it was\is a clear sky and i looking at the stars and some planes in the sky, and i noticed a very bright star, but i noticed it was moving, so i kept watching it and noticed it was moving left and right flying east. there were no strobe lights or colored marker lights on it. as i was watching it became dimmer and then disappeared.
